channel.title: Need Help please I'm grateful if you do
channel.description: Hi I need help changing myself to the official owner so when i login it says I'm the owner instead of co-owner I'm using reapage scape as a source (ty reaper for the source its the best)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2008, 04:56:46 pm[/size][hr]anyone please

item.title: Need Help please I'm grateful if you do
item.dc:creator: @dutch123dawn dutch123dawn
item.description:
@dutch123dawn wrote:

go to your client.java and search (ctrl+f) for the name of the ‘‘owner’’ if you found that just replace that with your name and keep searching (crtl+f) for that name and keep replace it, till you cant find that name of the ‘‘owner’’

i hope you kan do it on your own for now

goodluck with it

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help please I'm grateful if you do

if (playerRights == 2

^ mess with that untill you find what you want.

item.title: Need Help please I'm grateful if you do
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

@ vrac Defiled: It’s not going to be client side.

Just look to see if there is a serverCP.java file. If not, search the name in client.java (server side).

Just do that, then reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help please I'm grateful if you do
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Well if your using the server’s client, try searching in client.java(client side) and replace the owners name by yours. If not, if he left his account in characters folder, just demote him to regular player.

Hope this helped :),

Vrac

Read full topic
